hibernate-mapping.query: from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo classinfo where classinfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ? and year(classinfo.year) = ? order by classinfo.student.lastName

from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo classinfo where classinfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ? and year(classinfo.year) = ? and classinfo.student.isOldBoy = 0 and classinfo.student.statusId != 2 order by classinfo.student.lastName
